channel.title: Most basic server to download
channel.description: I want a server base that's the most like actual Runescape, at any point in time at or after 317. I was looking it up through the search box and couldn't find anything with the terms I was using ("most runescape-like servers", "most basic servers", etc), so now I'm posting. I want one just to toy around with and really make it my own.

item.title: Most basic server to download
item.dc:creator: @Cyrus93 Cyrus93
item.description:
@Cyrus93 wrote:

k1ng0frs:

Look in the download section there’s various list of servers you can take a look at

I obviously checked there and couldn’t find one that tries to be just like Runescape. Please give information that would be useful to me, and that involves actually reading what I asked for, which I bet you didn’t try to do.

[quote=“CodeBest, post:3, topic:446929”]origrs2

Most simple server you will EVER find

but now of course you’ll probably want some content lol, you can try hyperion, or PI (which i dont suggest unless you want to fix all stability and bugs like i did)[/quote]

What I meant was a server that is a private server with no added or custom content, just as close to an actual Runescape as there is, I see why you got that from what I said, but I don’t just want a basic Runescape private server, I wanted a Runescape private server trying to emulate the actual Runescape if that makes sense, and not try to be its own server.

[quote=“mr extremez, post:4, topic:446929”]Server:

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/308712-project-insanity-normal-pi-all-dupes-fixed.html

Client:

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/372401-cleanest-renamed-client-tiny-cache.html

That is if you want to load 377.[/quote]

I appreciate this, but I didn’t mean a clean source of an existing base like PI or Delta, I mean a clean source of an existing base that tries to be like Runescape, not it’s own unique server.

UndeadDino:

spades-scape

The simplest yet most helpful post in this topic. This is exactly what I wanted and I’ll be working on it right away (I hope someone can post a better version though, just in case there is one), I’ll still be watching this topic.

Thank you very much

Read full topic
